labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify That The Cost Of The Product In List Page And Details Page Are Equal

name: Validate_That_Cost_Of_Product_In_List_Page_And_Details_Page_Are_Equal
description:
Test Steps:

1- Go To ( http://live.techpanda.org/ )
2- Click On 'MOBILE' Menu
3- In The List Of All Mobiles, Read The Cost Of Sony Xperia Mobile. Note This Value.
4- Click On Sony Xperia Mobile.
5- Read The Sony Xperia Mobile From The Details Page.
6- Compare The Value In Step 3 & Step 5.

Expected Result:

- Product Value In List And Details Page Should Be Equal ($100)

Actual Result:

- Product Value In List And Details Page Are Equal.

Priority:

- High
